full_summary:
### Furloft Roof Shingle Replacement, Lower Fort Garry National Historic Site

#### Competition ID: 5P468-23-0107/B

#### Closing Date: 15 September 2023 at 16:00:00

#### Project Summary:
Parks Canada invites contractors to submit bids for the replacement of cedar shingle roofing systems on the roof of the Furloft Building at Lower Fort Garry National Historic Site. The scope of work includes supply and installation of cedar shingles, flashing, caulking, underlayment, trim boards, and other necessary roof repairs.

#### Project Details:
- **Project Value:** Estimated between $100,001 and $250,000 (inclusive of taxes).
- **Project Duration:** The successful contractor shall complete the work by 15 December 2023.
- **Contracting Entity:** Parks Canada.
- **Location:** Lower Fort Garry National Historic Site, 5925 Highway 9, St Andrews, MB R1A 4A8.
- **Trade Agreement:** This project falls under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Tender Requirements:
- Bids must be submitted via email to [soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca](mailto:soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca) or fax to 1-855-983-1808.
- Bidders are responsible for ensuring the complete and accurate submission of their bids.
- Late submissions will not be considered.

#### Request for Site Visit:
- A site visit is scheduled for 08 September 2023 at 10:00:00.
- Interested bidders must confirm their attendance by 08 September 2023 at 09:00:00.

#### Inquiries:
- All technical and contractual inquiries must be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority.
- Enquiries must be received within two business days prior to the closing date.

#### Document Notes:
- Bidders must refer to the solicitation documents available on the Government Electronic Tendering Service at [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca).

#### Acknowledgements:
- By submitting this bid, the Bidder acknowledges having read, understood, and agreed to the terms of this solicitation.
